translations: v．昂首阔步，趾高气扬地走：以自信、傲慢的态度行走。
· He swaggers around the office like he owns the place.
他在办公室里昂首阔步，就像他是老板一样。
n．自信的步态，趾高气扬的举止：表现出自信、傲慢的行为或举止。

sentences.sentence: Then recites that article, swaggers away!
sentences.translation: 然后将那文章背诵一遍，扬长而去！

sentences.sentence: Kind of level does read? Then recites that article, swaggers away!
sentences.translation: 然后将那文章背诵一遍，扬长而去！

sentences.sentence: He always swaggers around boasting about any little thing he has done.
sentences.translation: 他做了一点儿事，就到处丑表功。
